codebase.description: A CLI tool to read Hacker News stories.

prompts.prompt: Implement a feature to save comments of a single story in JSON or CSV format locally.
prompts.issue_comment: Model B throws error while using the `grep` command

prompts.prompt: I am not seeing the file I exported in the specified directory. Please return all relevant files in a code block.
Now the export works, but I am getting this error in the log `Error exporting to JSON: type object 'ColorScheme' has no attribute 'SUCCESS'`. Please fix it.
prompts.issue_comment: Both models removed the error log. However, the exporting functionality is broked now. Model B forgot to add the variable `base_filename` to name the file too.

prompts.prompt: Even though the error log is removed now. The exporting functionality has stopped working now.
prompts.issue_comment: Model A broke the existing comments fetching feature. Model B fixed the export issue. But the `-c` flag is not working while being useda alone.
